manifestDescription.message: Anti-phishing browser extension. Scan suspicious pages and links.
manifestDescription.description: Displayed in the Chrome/FF store and about:extensions

popupScanThisPage.description: Displayed on the popup page button.

popupScanHistory.description: Link for launching scan of browsing history on popup page.

popupSettings.description: Label for a button on the popup page to open the settings page.

optionsDescription.message: Through this form you can decide which PhishDetect Node to connect to.
optionsDescription.description: Description shown at the top of the options page

optionsNode.description: Label for the PhishDetect node form field on the options page

optionsEnableWebmail.description: Label for checkbox to enable webmail integration.

optionsSendAlerts.message: Automatically share alerts with PhishDetect Node
optionsSendAlerts.description: Label for checkbox to enable automatically sharing of alerts.

optionsContact.message: If you wish, you can leave your contact details:

optionsSave.description: Label for save button on options page.

optionsRestore.description: Link to restore default values on the options page.

historyScanInProgress.description: Text displayed when browsing history scan is in progress.

historyScanCompleted.description: Text displayed when browsing history scan is completed.

historyNothingFound.description: Text displayed when scan is completed and no results were found.

warningWarning.description: Title for a warning page when opening a dangerous url.

warningAway.description: Text for button to abort opening a dangerous url

warningPrevented.message: PhishDetect prevented you from visiting this page and, if you have this option enabled, alerted the administrator of your configured PhishDetect Node. For more information about this warning read the PhishDetect Help Page:
warningPrevented.description: Text displayed when PhishDetect prevents you from visiting a page

warningReportedNotSafe.message: PhishDetect reported it as not safe.
warningReportedNotSafe.description: Text displayed when PhishDetect prevents you from visiting a page

warningWrongfullyBlocked.message: If you think this website was wrongfully blocked, please report the mistake here:
warningWrongfullyBlocked.description: Text displayed when PhishDetect prevents you from visiting a page

warningReportMistake.description: Link text to report a wrongfully blocked page

apikeyGetToken.message: In order to continue using the PhishDetect Browser Extension, you will be required to enter a valid secret token. You don't have one yet?
apikeyGetToken.description: Paragraph text. Following this text is a link to register for a token

apikeyRegister.description: Text for a link to the registration page

apikeyNode.description: Label for a text input for the url of your PhishDetect node

apikeyToken.description: Label for a text input for your secret token

apikeySave.description: Text for button to save api token and node settings

contextMenuReportPage.description: Text for context menu option to report a page

contextMenuReportLink.description: Text for context menu option to report a link

contextMenuScanPage.description: Text for context menu option to scan a page

contextMenuScanLink.description: Text for context menu option to scan a link

webmailWarningPleaseBeCautious.description: Secondary text for a warning message

webmailWarningSender.message: The email was sent by a known malicious address.
webmailWarningSender.description: Explanation of a webmail warning event

webmailWarningLinks.message: The email contains known malicious links.
webmailWarningLinks.description: Explanation of a webmail warning event

webmailWarningHelp.message: For more information visit our help page:
webmailWarningHelp.description: Label for a link to the help page.

webmailLinkWarning.message: PhishDetect Warning: this link is malicious!
webmailLinkWarning.description: Warning text for a known malicious link

webmailDialog.message: How do you want to open this link?
webmailDialog.description: Warning text for a known malicious link

webmailPreview.message: You are about to open this link. Do you want to continue?
webmailPreview.description: Confirmation dialog text when opening a link

webmailPreviewContinue.description: Button text to continue visit to a link

webmailPreviewCancel.description: Button text to cancel visit to a link

reportEmailReportedAlready.description: Text shown when trying to report an email that was already reported.

reportEmailConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to report this email to your PhishDetect Node administrator?
reportEmailConfirm.description: Confirmation message when reporting an email

popupReportThisPage.description: Button to report the page from a popup

popupReported.description: Shown in a popup when an email is reported.

popupScanning.description: Shown in a popup when an email is being scanned.

popupTokenRequired.message: We now require PhishDetect users to register a secret token.
popupTokenRequired.description: Paragraph in a popup explaining the need for a token

popupActivate.message: Continue here to activate your browser!
popupActivate.description: Link text to register for a secret token to activate PhishDetect

apikeyErrorSecretToken.message: You did not provide a valid secret token.
apikeyErrorSecretToken.description: Error text when no secret token is entered in the apikey form

apikeySaved.description: Displayed when an apikey is saved succesfully

optionsSaved.description: Displayed when settings are saved succesfully

optionsSettings.description: Heading for the form on the settings page.
